titles.title: To provide additional appropriations for the public health and social services emergency fund, and for other purposes.
To provide additional appropriations for the public health and social services emergency fund, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Appropriations, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Appropriations, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services
Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This bill provides additional appropriations to the Department of Health and Human Services Public Health and Social Services Emergency Fund for preventing, preparing for, and responding to COVID-19.
